usa mitar dahathunayi dashama pahaki. 3 maligawe idiriyen wu prawesha shalawe diga maligawe palala hatiyata ma mitar nawayak wa da ehi palala maligawa idiripita mitar hatharayi dashama pahak wa da thibune ya. 4 ohu maligawata garadi sawikarana lada kawulu saduwe ya. 5 ohu maligawath, diwya-wakyasthanayath watakara maligawe biththi wateta, eewata ya kara udumahal godanangi ya. 6 udumahel pahatha ma thattuwe palala mitar dekayi dashama dekaki.
